madak awankawa sithanna,apa wata siduwana siduwim walin sama witama apa samaga nathara wanne siddhi damayange saranshayak noweda?.apa mathaka lesa artha dakwanne eyama noweda.sithanna apa kamaththen narabana sama deyakinma balaporoththu wanne windanathmaka mathakayak noweda?.chithrapataya narabime awasana prathipalaya lesa prekshakaya patalili sahagatha thathwayata pathwanne(wruthanthayak gana adahas nokalemi.esema samahara chithrapata wala awasanaye prekshakaya gatalu sahagatha thathwayata path karanne kuthuhalayada samagini.ee nirmanaye awasanayen pasuwada kalpana kirimata yamak ithuru kirimaki.ma mehidi adahas kale sithannata deyak windinnata deyak nomathiwa awasan kirima) nam eya sarthaka niramanayak wiya hakida.
